text.0: may viṣṇu form and mould the womb may tvaṣṭar duly shape the forms.
text.1: prajāpati infuse the stream and dhātar lay the germ for thee.
text.2: o sinīvālī set the germ set thou the germ sarasvatī.
text.3: may the twain gods bestow the germ the aśvins crowned with lotuses.
text.4: that which the aśvins twain rub forth with the attritionsticks of gold.
text.5: that germ of thine we invocate that in the tenth month thou mayst bear.
